IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Promotion of educational and cultural welfare
IRS990.MissionDesc: Organized to promote the educational and cultural welfare of LSU at Alexandria by accepting gifts for the purpose of providing scholarships and professorships, aiding research or such other designated projects for the benefit of LSU at Alexandria, LA.
IRS990.Desc: Support for Louisiana State University of Alexandira's Masterplan for institutional improvement

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: Establishment and award of professorships, scholarships & Faculty

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: Operation and administration of the foundation

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part III, Line 4: Description of organization's collections and how it furthers its purpose.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Permanent art collection and additional donor gifts are held for exhibition, education, public awareness and advancement of the arts

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Endowment funds are held to establish permanent funding for professorships, scholarships, and other institutional purposes in accordance with donor restrictionsSome endowment funds held by the Louisiana State University Foundation on behalf of Louisiana State University at Alexandria Foundation in accordance with the Affiliation Agreement between the parties.Other endowment funds are held by Central Louisiana Community Foundation, an unrelated nonprofit foundation in accordance with an agreement between the parties. These funds were established by donor contributions for the benefit of Alexandria Museum of Arts, a wholly owned subsidiary of Louisiana State University at Alexandria FoundationOther endowment funds are also invested with Raymond James.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The 990 will be reviewed by the LSUA Foundation Board, the LSUA Foundation President and the LSUA Foundation Accountant

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: All employees of the organization are direct employees of Louisiana State University at Alexandria. The policies of LSUA govern the organization. Compliance is monitored and enforced by the University in accordance with its policies

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The organization makes its governing documents, conflicts of interest policy and financial statements available to the public upon request
There were no changes to the auditor selection process, however the entity did change audit firms for the year
